questions.stem: Explain the key principles of Coordination Chemistry Fundamentals.
Apply Coordination Chemistry Fundamentals to the following scenario...
Explain the key principles of Electron Configuration.
Apply Electron Configuration to the following scenario...
Explain the key principles of Ionic Bonding.
Apply Ionic Bonding to the following scenario...
Explain the key principles of Oxidation States.

Explain how Crystal Field Theory builds on atomic orbital concepts.

rubric.full_credit: Connects CFT to d-orbital shapes, explains splitting mechanism
